home.introduction: This project consists of a viewer and query of data obtained through a series of sensors connected to a Raspberry Pi
home.more_information: More information about the project in this
home.technologies: The following technologies, languages and frameworks have been used for development
home.technologies.accuweather: For external weather data, Accuweather API has been used
home.technologies.apis: The project API is a set of microservices made in C # with .NET 6 and EF for data access
home.technologies.authentication: All calls to microservices are made using JWT authentication
home.technologies.gateway: The gateway has been implemented with the Ocelot framework
home.technologies.docker: Both the dashboard and the microservices are dockerized in containers
current_data.retrieve_data_from_accuweat: The free account is limited to 50 requests per day. Once the limit is exceeded, the API will respond with a 503 (Unauthorized) error.
current_data.last_data.air_parameters: Atmospheric pressure of {{pressure}} hPa with {{humidity}}% of humidity on {{dateTime, LLLL}}
current_data.last_data.ambient_temperatu: Ambient temperature of {{temperature}} ºC on {{dateTime, LLLL}}
current_data.last_data.ground_temperatur: Ground temperature of {{temperature}} ºC on {{dateTime, LLLL}}
current_data.last_data.rainfall: Rainfall in the last hour {{amount}} mm from {{fromDateTime, LLLL}} to {{toDateTime, LLLL}}
current_data.last_data.wind_measurement: Wind speed {{speed}} km/h direction {{direction}} on {{dateTime, LLLL}}
current_data.last_data.wind_measurement_: Wind gust during the last hour {{speed}} km/h direction {{direction}} on {{dateTime, LLLL}}
historical_data.initial_date.max_date: Initial date cannot be a future date
historical_data.final_date.max_date: Final date cannot be a future date
historical_data.final_date.min_date: Final date cannot be lower than initial date
historical_data.grouping.values: Grouping must be a valid item from the list
